markdownRemark.html:
I’m switching to a modified version of the excellent Object theme by gluttony for this blog. I like the cleaner content-focused look that it brings, and especially feel like it helps my code samples stand out. I hope you like it.

My site continues to be generated as static pages by octopress, and written using Sublime Text. Both are unreservedly recommended.
